Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 75th/Stewart
ShortDescription: Eastbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via  74th, Halsted, 76th, Vincennes and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/Stewart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via  74th, Halsted, 76th, Vincennes and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/Stewart.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with delays due to to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Augusta
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, Division, Kostner, Chicago and Pulaski due to police activity near Pulaski/Augusta.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, Division, Kostner, Chicago, then resume their normal route on Pulaski due to police activity near Pulaski/Augusta.

Allow extra travel time.
